|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLM4G1FE3B-B001; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B8G3346B-MCK0; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = ASIX;AX88760; |eth2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |sw1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |wan_ports = <!-- 1 --> |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = <!-- 4 --> |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->

|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 3.0, SATA 3.0, Micro SD Card slot, |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_sata_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, DE-9,, (115200 8N1),, CON7 |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, populated,, CON8

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Samsung]]'' Exynos 5 Dual 5250 @1.7GHz Dual Core SoC *RAM: 2GB Dual Channel DDR3 (LPDDR3) *Storage: 4GB eMMC 4.5 *GPU: Mali-T604 MP4
==Links of Interest== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arndale_Board ''Arndale Board'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2012/10/28/249-samsung-exynos-5-cortex-a15-arndale-development-board/ ''$249 Samsung Exynos 5 (Cortex A15) Arndale Development Board'' on '''CNXSOFT''' ] *[https://wiki.linaro.org/Boards/Arndale/Setup/EnterpriseUbuntuServer ''Ubuntu Enterprise Server for Arndale'' on '''Linaro Wiki''']
